accumulated_learnings: X Jobs page uses listitem role for job cards
Job cards contain: title, company, location (Remote), salary in name attribute
Filters display as tabs: 'Remote 1', 'Seniority 3' showing active filter count
Page loads with progress bars, need 3-5 sec wait for full content
User session persists across browser navigation

known_selectors.job_data: name attribute of listitem contains: Title Company Location Salary
known_selectors.job_id_extraction: Click listitem -> extract from URL path
